message: I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to acquire this valuable product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident will bring you significant value. I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $1,100,000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I see the value in this product, $1,100,000 is still a bit high for my budget.  I'm willing to pay $1,050,000 for it.  Let's see if we can find common ground.

I understand that $1,050,000 is a bit below your target, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you a discount, but I need to ensure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,075,000.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price.  $1,075,000 is getting closer to what I can afford.  To make this deal happen, I'm willing to offer $1,025,000. This is my final offer.  Let me know if you're willing to accept.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1,025,000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1,075,000, which is the same price I offered in Round 3. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'm afraid I'll have to explore other options.
